sentences.english: The second part is the foundation of civil protect system.

sentences.english: Head Er check just expresses, will up one class court mentions counterappeal.
sentences.chinese: 首爾檢方表示，將向上一級法院提起抗訴。

sentences.english: The people's court shall conduct a trial denovo of a case protested by the people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 人民檢察院提出抗訴的案件，人民法院應當再審。

sentences.english: "The greatness of America is the right to protest for right, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “美國的偉大之處是爲正確的抗訴權，”他說。
